channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiWeb
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiWeb

item.title: CVE-2024-33509|2024-07-09T15:33:24.418Z -- fortinet -- fortiweb
item.description: An improper certificate validation vulnerability [CWE-295] in FortiWeb 7.2.0 through 7.2.1, 7.0 all versions, 6.4 all versions and 6.3 all versions may allow a remote and unauthenticated attacker in a Man-in-the-Middle position to decipher and/or tamper with the communication channel between the device and different endpoints used to fetch data for Web Application Firewall (WAF).

item.title: CVE-2024-23665|2024-06-04T17:46:07.306Z -- fortinet -- fortiweb
item.description: Multiple improper authorization vulnerabilities [CWE-285] in FortiWeb version 7.4.2 and below, version 7.2.7 and below, version 7.0.10 and below, version 6.4.3 and below, version 6.3.23 and below may allow an authenticated attacker to perform unauthorized ADOM operations via crafted requests.

item.title: CVE-2024-23107|2024-06-04T17:46:10.509Z -- fortinet -- fortiweb
item.description: An exposure of sensitive information to an unauthorized actor vulnerability [CWE-200] in FortiWeb version 7.4.0, version 7.2.4 and below, version 7.0.8 and below, 6.3 all versions may allow an authenticated attacker to read password hashes of other administrators via CLI commands.
